title: Fantastic location with Fantastic Down town Views!!
posting_body: More specials-free parking for 6 months; if move in by 9/30-1 month free only for September move in's.
Amazing apartment is perfectly positioned for convenience and laid-back lifestyle, in eclectic and cultured East Austin, with fantastic views of downtown.

This super apartment has so many amenities and features including a walk in closet, linen closet, full size washer/dryer connections, hardwood flooring, stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, pantry, patio/balcony, garden tub, bbq grills, club house, fitness center, billiards, private cabanas, yoga studio, outdoor terrace, pet scrub center, pool, and so much more.
Images are of the community not necessarily the specific unit.
